short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install and update SmartTHING NetCommunity Custom Parts easily and quickly

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool is compatible with Blackbaud's Internet Solutions and NetCommunity Products and allows easy install of our SmartTHING custom parts. All the user requiers is a valid product name and license for the part, entering these in the tool automates the installation of the product.
